bioconda.name: bioconductor-variantfiltering
bioconda.summary: Filtering of coding and non-coding genetic variants

biotools.summary: Filter genetic variants using different criteria such as inheritance model, amino acid change consequence, minor allele frequencies across human populations, splice site strength, conservation, etc.

bioschemas.name: VariantFiltering
bioschemas.summary: Filter genetic variants using different criteria such as inheritance model, amino acid change consequence, minor allele frequencies across human populations, splice site strength, conservation, etc.
